title: Lake McDonald Reflection and Peaks
description: Crystal-clear waters reveal the rocky bottom beneath verdant forest slopes, while distant peaks rise majestically across the horizon. This serene tableau captures the pristine wilderness character of Glacier National Park's largest lake, where mountain and water exist in perfect harmony.
location: Lake McDonald, Glacier National Park, Montana

title: Mountain Road into Wilderness
description: A striking perspective down a mountain highway reveals the majesty of Glacier National Park's interior landscape. Golden center lines draw the eye toward dramatic peaks framed by towering conifers, creating a timeless sense of journey through pristine wilderness.
location: Going-to-the-Sun Road, Glacier National Park, Montana

title: Carved Through Stone
description: A winding mountain road cuts dramatically through towering cliff faces, revealing the raw geological power of Glacier National Park. Lush coniferous forest blankets the surrounding slopes while distant peaks rise majestically beyond, creating a composition that celebrates the interplay between human engineering and pristine wilderness.
location: Going-to-the-Sun Road, Glacier National Park

title: Lake McDonald Stillness
description: Crystal-clear waters reveal the rocky lake bed beneath pristine surface, while forested slopes frame distant peaks in an atmosphere of profound tranquility. This composition captures the serene majesty of Glacier National Park's largest lake, a timeless testament to the park's untouched wilderness.
location: Lake McDonald, Glacier National Park, Montana

title: Road to the Continental Divide
description: A compelling perspective study capturing the iconic yellow center line of a Glacier National Park road stretching toward distant peaks. Framed by towering conifers and crowned by dramatic mountain geology, this composition invites the viewer into the heart of the park's wild landscape.
location: Going-to-the-Sun Road, Glacier National Park

title: Mountain Road Through Stone
description: A dramatic mountain road carved through towering rock faces reveals the raw geological power of Glacier National Park. Verdant forests blanket the surrounding peaks, while distant summits pierce a brilliant sky, capturing the untamed majesty of this alpine landscape.
